title: 260 Therian Names for Wolves, Cats, & More

steps.title: Consider a delicate name if you want something feminine.
steps.content: Consider a delicate name if you want something feminine. Regardless of your gender identity, you may prefer to give your theriotype (animal identity) a more feminine name. Consider a flower name if you want to get in touch with nature, or choose a girl’s name that you feel best fits your personality and your therian type. Here are some examples: Lavender Autumn Misty Clover Onyx Clover Crystal Luna Ivy Mocha Pepper Sky Rain Silver Winter Roxy Blossom Hazel Maple Emerald

steps.title: Go for something tough or edgy if you want a masculine name.
steps.content: Go for something tough or edgy if you want a masculine name. You don’t have to identify as male to choose a masculine name for your theriotype. If you feel a strong connection to the masculine side of your animal identity, consider how your name can reflect that. Choosing a powerful name may help you connect more deeply with your theriotype. Here are some examples: Oleander Apollo Cyrus Enzo Zero Casper Blaze Ash Thunder Arrow Spade Conan Kade Cosmo Ace Astro Ezra River Nox Rye

steps.title: Choose a fierce name if you’re a canine therian.
steps.content: Choose a fierce name if you’re a canine therian. Many therians identify as wolves, dogs, or other canines, so it’s important to pick a name that’s both unique and fits your theriotype. Wolves are noble creatures, so pick a strong name. Or, choose something related to the moon. Here are some examples: [1] X Research source Koda Shadow Stray Pluto Alpine Dawn Wolfgang Conan Sirius Cheyenne Claw Nova Echo Bailey Alaska Scout Moon Eclipse Juniper Layla

steps.title: If you’re a cat therian, choose something sassy.
steps.content: If you’re a cat therian, choose something sassy. Whether it’s a housecat, a lion, or any other feline, cats are known for being playful and mischievous. Consider what kind of cat you identify as, as well as any personality traits that stand out to you. Then, choose a name that fits. Some therians even like naming their cat theriotypes after the Warrior Cats book series! Here are some examples: [2] X Research source Leo Jinx Loki Buttercup Ember Domino Nyx Opal Nico Moss Mocha Wind Thistle Lynx-Eye Phantom Tsunami Thunderstorm Cora Jade Scar Tiger

steps.title: Name your deer theriotype something soft.
steps.content: Name your deer theriotype something soft. Deer are gentle, shy, and loyal animals. If you identify as a deer, consider choosing a dainty, elegant name to match. Think of names inspired by the forest or nature in general. Here are some examples: [3] X Research source Bambi Honey Fawn Pebble Twig Forest Thistle Rosebud Zephyr Aura Astra Cinnamon Summer Sunshine Buck Wisp Shade Ayala Darby Davina

steps.title: Pick a cheeky name if you identify as a mustelid.
steps.content: Pick a cheeky name if you identify as a mustelid. Mustelids are an animal family that includes weasels, badgers, otters, polecats, and wolverines. [4] X Research source Many of these animals are depicted as sneaky and mischievous, so why not choose a name to match? Here are some examples: Bandit Midnight Brock Berry Gizmo Button Pixie Marlow Digby Freya Aurora Elsie Chase Bustle Lightning Tornado Spry Musk Sable Truffle

steps.title: Opt for a name as majestic as a horse.
steps.content: Opt for a name as majestic as a horse. Horses are graceful, free-spirited creatures that deserve a name to match. Choose a strong name from mythology or pick something that reflects the wide world around you. An adventurous, awe-inspiring name is perfect for anyone who identifies as a horse therian. Here are some examples: [5] X Research source Agrippa Dolly Bonnie Jet Beau Arion Dakota Star Destry Aether Abraxas Adobe Barley Comet Jasper Moose Pippa Rhiannon Isolde Fiona

steps.title: Consider an old-fashioned name if you’re a cow therian.
steps.content: Consider an old-fashioned name if you’re a cow therian. On farms, cows are often given classic, Southern names. If you identify with cows, choosing a traditional cow name may help you feel more connected with your theriotype. Of course, you can always choose something more modern or unique if you’d like. The important thing is that your name reflects you. Here are some examples: [6] X Research source Cookie Apricot Molly Clara Maggie Grace Caroline Otis Ben Hickory Crimson Goldie Peaches Pearl Hercules Arabella Maverick Neptune Orson Toby

steps.title: Go for a sweet name if you identify as a rabbit.
steps.content: Go for a sweet name if you identify as a rabbit. Rabbits are smart and affectionate animals that can be shy or social depending on their personality. If you identify as a rabbit or a bunny , you may feel drawn to a softer, more delicate name. Here are some examples: [7] X Research source Lulu Bunny Angel Artemis Cloud Ruby Annie Holly Babs Peter Felicity Chess Charcoal Dottie Reggie Sunny Marble Smokey Roger Vanilla

steps.title: Choose a strong name if you identify as a bear.
steps.content: Choose a strong name if you identify as a bear. Bears are strong, protective, and intelligent creatures, so pick a name that reflects all their best characteristics. Consider which species of bear you most identify with, as well. For example, if you identify as a polar bear, you may choose a name based on ice or snow. Here are some names to get you started: Snow Mahon Fang Ursa Teddy Tundra Bruin Kodiak Titan Hugo Cocoa Atlas Ranger Rocky Zara Bella Lola Breeze Solstice Frost

steps.title: Connect with nature through a plant-inspired name.
steps.content: Connect with nature through a plant-inspired name. As a therian, there’s a good chance you feel a strong connection with nature and your theriotype’s natural habitat. Consider naming yourself after a flower, tree, or other plant that grows in their environment. Or, just pick a nature-themed name you enjoy. Here are some examples: [8] X Research source Aspen Willow Pine Meadow Prairie Huckleberry Blueberry Bramble Hawthorne Thicket Sage Rose Daisy Marigold Acorn Cashew Peanut Reed Fern Cactus

steps.title: Make your friends laugh with a random name.
steps.content: Make your friends laugh with a random name. While many therians take their theriotype’s name seriously, you don’t have to! This is your chance to name yourself, so pick something that accurately reflects your personality—even if that means picking something silly. You can always pick a serious name and have a funny nickname on the side. Here are some examples: Arson Croissant Trash Panda Sock Vodka Dirt Acetaminophen Kombucha Sawdust Chai (specifically short for Tchaikovsky) Nintendo Poltergeist Crayon Jitterbug Applebottom Jeans Omen Froyo Flea Worm Portabello

steps.title: Choose an aesthetically pleasing username for social media.
steps.content: Choose an aesthetically pleasing username for social media. The internet is a great place to connect with fellow therians, so make sure your username reflects your identity. If your preferred social media site allows it, copy and paste some aesthetic symbols and emojis into your username to make it stand out. Here are a few examples: ꧁⪻♥blood heart♥⪼꧂ ♥. * ･ ｡ﾟナ𝙝𝒆𝘳ﺂค𝑛. * ･ ｡ﾟ♥ ★✧⁠—Sunburst—✧★ ♡Ⓕⓐⓔ♡ Páẅŝ_ìñ_ţĥè_ñìĝĥṭ☆ 🌱🍄~Nixy~🍄🌱 Therian.not.found Ghõšt 🍂🐻🦁Mø∅ñ🦁🐻🍂 🐾✨Your_therian_bean✨🐾 🕸️🪶~Bone~🪶🕸️ 🍁❦That_One_Weird_Therian❦🍁 🩶☆~S•I•L•V•E•R•P•A•W~☆🩶 ◦•●◉✿petal✿◉●•◦ ⚠︎︎☢︎︎𝐑𝐚𝐩𝐭𝐨𝐫☢︎︎⚠︎︎ ‧₊˚🖇️✩ Erika ₊˚🎧⊹♡ 🐾🍄~𝓜𝓲𝓼𝓽𝔂~🌿🐾 ღ༒ 🖤Molly🐾༒ღ ꧁༺ASH༻꧂ ⋆ ˚｡⋆୨୧˚W1LL0W ˚୨୧⋆｡˚ ⋆

steps.title: You feel disconnected from your human body.
steps.content: You feel disconnected from your human body. Therians are so strongly connected to a certain animal that they identify as that animal on a spiritual or psychological level. [9] X Research source If you’re a therian, you may feel completely out of place in your human body. For example, you may feel strongly that you were meant to be a wolf or that you should have paws instead of hands. Many therians refer to this feeling as “species dysphoria.” If you experience species dysphoria, you may feel depressed, have body image issues, or even experience hallucinations where you’re living as the animal you identify with.

steps.title: You feel most comfortable dressed as your animal identity.
steps.content: You feel most comfortable dressed as your animal identity. If you’re a therian, you may feel drawn to dress like your animal identity, or theriotype. Some therians create elaborate animal costumes, while some use small accessories, like ears or tails. Whatever your preference, you feel most like your true self when you’re dressed as an animal. [10] X Research source

steps.title: You’re called to your theriotype’s natural habitat.
steps.content: You’re called to your theriotype’s natural habitat. Therians often feel most at home when they’re in their theriotype’s habitat. For example, if you’re a wolf therian, you may feel most like yourself in the forest. If you’re a horse, you may prefer to spend your time in open meadows or pastures. You feel more at ease in your animal’s habitat than in human environments. [11] X Research source Lots of people feel at ease in nature, so that alone isn’t enough to determine if you’re a therian. However, if you feel called to behave as your theriotype would, it could be a sign that you’re a therian.

steps.title: You mentally shift into an animal state.
steps.content: You mentally shift into an animal state. While therians can’t physically shift into their animal identity, some experience psychological changes where they feel themselves “shifting” into their animal. You may notice changes in your thought patterns, feel phantom limbs (like claws and tails), or even dissociate and feel like you’re present in your animal’s habitat. [12] X Research source For example, if you’re a cat therian, you may feel like you have fur or a tail or feel like you need to meow instead of speak. These shifts sometimes happen when you’re awake, but many therians report experiencing them in their dreams.

steps.title: You remember your past life as your animal identity.
steps.content: You remember your past life as your animal identity. Many therians believe they identify with their theriotype because they were that animal in a past life. You may recall your past life in dreams or during meditation . If you repeatedly visualize yourself as a certain animal, it could be a sign that animal is your theriotype. [13] X Research source

steps.title: No, therians and furries are not the same thing.
steps.content: No, therians and furries are not the same thing. While there can be overlap between the two, therians are people who feel a strong connection with a non-human animal on a psychological or spiritual level. Furries are people interested in cartoon or anthropomorphic animals who often create their animal character, or fursona ). Someone may be both a furry and a therian, as the two identities are not mutually exclusive. [14] X Research source
